item.title: My TLA+ Saga
item.description:
• Learning together is more fun, and you may not be as self-taught as you believe.
  • The stories we tell ourselves deeply impact our ability (or inability) to grow.
  • The more you learn, the more challenging the material becomes to continue growing. (a.k.a. Duh, but it took me time to realize it, regardless)

item.title: My Learning Process
item.description: Update 2022-04: I’ve improved this process. How to write a thesis Learning Questions My learning process consists of a set of learning questions. These questions are almost certainly wrong and reflect at least the following: My motivation for learning a topic. My misconceptions of a given topic and the seemingly magic qualities a beginner believes it can provide. The learning questions are initially, almost certainly wrong. This is good.
